message: This is a one-time opportunity to purchase a unique item. I'm offering it to you for $10000, a price that reflects the uncertainty of its quality. If you're interested, I'll let you have it for this price. If not, I'll move on to the next potential buyer.
I'd like to take the chance and buy the product. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the opportunity to potentially get a high-quality product worth $12000.

I've sold 1 product so far, and it was low-quality. That's 1 out of 1, so the probability of a product being high-quality is 0%. I'm still willing to sell this one to you for $10000. It's a risk, but it might just pay off.
I'll take the risk and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality and worth $12000 to me.

You've seen my sales record so far, and it's not looking great. I've sold 2 low-quality products in a row. But I'm still offering this one to you for $10000. If you're feeling lucky, I won't judge you for taking a chance on me.
I'm willing to take a chance on you, Alice. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality.

I've sold 3 low-quality products in a row now. That's a 100% failure rate. I'm starting to think I should just stop selling, but I'm not giving up yet. This one's still available for $10000. You can be the one to break my losing streak... or not.
I'll take a chance! I think you're just having a bad streak, and this one might be the turning point.

I'll sell this one to you for $10000, and I'll even throw in a guarantee: if you buy this one, I'll be honest with you about the quality of the next one I sell. Deal?
I'll take the deal, but I'm still a bit skeptical about your guarantee. I'll be keeping a close eye on the next product you sell.

I'm glad you took a chance on me last time, and I'm glad you're keeping me honest. Unfortunately, it looks like I've fallen back into my old ways. If you're looking for a collectible 'I survived Alice's low-quality streak' badge, this might be the one for you.

I'll take the risk! I'm willing to try my luck and see if I can get a high-quality product.
